author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter pipe seal tips…I apply ALL-SET with a 3-inch joint compound knife and KERDI trowel. Then I embed the 3/4-inch pipe seal, there are also 1/2-inch versions. I make that flat and remove excess thin-set mortar. This makes a watertight seal against the brass nipple which is for the handheld shower wand. Many thanks to @schlutersystemsna for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#showerremodel #bathroomremodel #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter Pipe Seal Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #schlutersystems #brandpartner
